title: @Riot KateyKhaos PROJECT : zed feedback
body:
Hey !

I have some feedbacks about the PROJECT : zed skin in the PBE, but first of all I would like to congratulat the skin team beacuse this skin is awesome, good job :D .I still think that this skin can be improved ( it's why pbe exists ) so I got a few suggestions :

MODEL : 
-->I love the whole design, but I think that his blue scarf should be red or black, blue doesnt really fit the theme and I think it would be a cool change :D
-->I think that his head is too small compared to his body, he looks more like robot : zed than project : zed and I think that he should get some red visors for eyes instead of a camera.

BACK :
--> AWESOME, GOOD JOB

PASSIVE:
--> maybe add a little effect for his passive like his red of his body( or just blades )  intensifies ?

Q:
--> AWESOME 

W:
--> Very cool, I think that it's a bit too dark, maybe turn this down a bit so his shadow looks like more a red hollogram ?

E:
--> AWESOME

R:
--> AWESOME

DEATH ANIMATION:
--> haha cant judge this one, Riot Galleta already said that there are particules for this, but didnt hit the pbe yet. I hope that the portal he jumps in looks like the one from the PROJECT teaser on the internet :D 

SPLASH ART:
--> same, I will edit this when it will come on the pbe :D

TL;DR : AWESOME skin that can be improved with some little changes.

Thank you for your comprehension !

Uncle Zed

replies.body: yes please take out the blue and change his camera to a visor an assassin is supposed to be dark and sexy not iron man
